participant_abstract.sent: Presentations were presented well and the meeting ran smothely.

participant_actions.sent: Interface and industrial designers are working together on the look and feel of the remote control.
The marketing expert has to prepare the product evaluation.
And the progect maneger is dealing with all his problems as well as preparinf for the next meeting.

participant_decisions.sent: The remote control case will be made out of rubber.
The battery will be keneticly powered.
Rubber buttons and case double curved.
